content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **materials** japanese size 7/0 crochet hook 4 0mm **note ** the website linked has four patterns on each page each pattern has its own ravelry entry flower a 2 tube b 3 and fish d 4 the pdf files with the patterns are split into two and all the hook and yarn information is listed in the first pdf 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/amikomo3-28/ 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amikomo3-28-flower-tawashi-a 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amikomo3-28-tube-tawashi-b 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amikomo3-28-fish-tawashi-d
